did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Hotel School video, film and tape collection, 1972-1993.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University. School of Hotel Administration.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes VHS, 3/4" and betamax tapes of Hotel Ezra Cornell (HEC) Events; Management Intern Program (MIP); Hotel School Courses; Hotel School Events, Development, History and films of Campus Scenes, the Meek Children, and Company Films.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Cornell University. School of Hotel Administration -- Societies, etc.

prefercite.p: Hotel School Video Collection, #28-11-3951. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

Series V. Films and Cassette Tapes
Boxes 17
